title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series in the chart, no error message is displayed to inform the user.
EB: Bug 103963: If there is no data for a series in the chart, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a chart with a data definition. 
2. Select a column that does not contain any data. 
3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
